name: Raging Titan
description: Show your tactical genius, your military leadership and your strategic thinking in this demanding fight! Defend your headquarters against superior forces!
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows 7 or higher Processor: Core 2 Duo Memory: 2 GB RAM Graphics: nVidia GeForce 7 / AMD Radeon X16xx DirectX: Version 9.0 Storage: 2 GB available space
recommended_requirements: Processor: Intel i5 Memory: 4 GB RAM Graphics: nVidia GeForce 400 / AMD Radeon HD 4000
